TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_South_sudan, title = South_sudan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/South_sudan} }

S.FORM: South sudan hya' ga cyux maki' tay 8 00 N, 30 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 644,329 sq km (maki' tay 42ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga ) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 12,530,717. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Juba. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 9 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Salva Kiir Mayardit, aring ryax 9 squ byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2011 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Sooth sodan hya' ga cyox maki' tay 8 00 N, 30 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 644,329 sq km (maki' tay 42ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga ) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 12,530,717. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Joba. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 9 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Salva Kiir Mayardit, aring ryax 9 sqo byacing tay 7 sa kawas 2011 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
